001package ca.gc.cra.radar.api;
002
003import ca.gc.cra.radar.application.pipeline.PosterUseCase;
004import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.IoMode;
005import ca.gc.cra.radar.config.PosterConfig;
006import java.util.Map;
007
008/**
009 * Entry point for rendering reconstructed protocol traffic into poster outputs.
010 * <p>Supports file and Kafka IO modes for both inputs and outputs.</p>
011 *
012 * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
013 */
014public final class PosterCli {
015  private PosterCli() {}
016
017  /**
018   * Parses poster CLI arguments and triggers the {@link PosterUseCase} pipeline.
019   *
020   * @param args CLI arguments in {@code key=value} form
021   * @throws Exception if configuration validation or poster processing fails
022   * @since RADAR 0.1-doc
023   */
024  public static void main(String[] args) throws Exception {
025    Map<String, String> kv = CliArgsParser.toMap(args);
026    PosterConfig config;
027    try {
028      config = PosterConfig.fromMap(kv);
029    } catch (IllegalArgumentException ex) {
030      System.err.println("poster: " + ex.getMessage());
031      usage();
032      return;
033    }
034
035    if ((config.ioMode() == IoMode.KAFKA || config.posterOutMode() == IoMode.KAFKA)
036        && config.kafkaBootstrap().isEmpty()) {
037      System.err.println("poster: kafkaBootstrap is required when Kafka input/output selected");
038      usage();
039      return;
040    }
041
042    new PosterUseCase().run(config);
043  }
044
045  private static void usage() {
046    System.err.println(
047        "usage: poster [httpIn=<dir>|httpIn=kafka:<topic>] [tnIn=<dir>|tnIn=kafka:<topic>] "
048            + "[httpOut=<dir>|posterOutMode=KAFKA kafkaHttpReportsTopic=<topic>] "
049            + "[tnOut=<dir>|posterOutMode=KAFKA kafkaTnReportsTopic=<topic>] "
050            + "[ioMode=FILE|KAFKA] [posterOutMode=FILE|KAFKA] [kafkaBootstrap=host:port] "
051            + "[kafkaHttpPairsTopic=..] [kafkaTnPairsTopic=..] [decode=none|transfer|all] -- renders message pairs");
052  }
053}
